attributes.review: Thought this app would help me in my life, but has done nothing but make it worse. 0/10 would not recommend using this app to better your life or try to run a country.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: When I opened the app it immediately crashed and sent my iPhone into overheat mode. In a panic I ran to my freezer and dropped my iPhone into the ice bin. I left it there for 3 hours. When I came back my iPhone was shattered just like my soul.
attributes.title: Broke my iPhone

attributes.review: Every time I try to do something it doesn't let me it just exits me out the page and who ever is the creator of the app needs to improve something and so I think this app is extremely a disappointment👎😡
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.review: This app was terrible! It took up SO much storage and was POINTLESS. I would’ve given this app 0 stars or a half of a star if I could! I cannot believe that some people actually gave this app five stars🤮. They’re 🤡🤡!! (I don’t know what to write for this).
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP. HAS TO BE THE WORST ON THE APPSTORE

attributes.review: Great App! Highly recommend. Great for getting unbiased information!
attributes.title: Trump Fan

attributes.review: This app just hacked into my phone started up apple TV and played the Bee Movie!!! 😡😡 Like how does that even happen!! 🤬 Next thing is it even started up my patreon and played my personal Yagami Yato files!!! In the car 🚘😖😭😡
attributes.title: Annoying

attributes.review: I so wanted this app to be amazing so I could show my love & support of President Trump, but this app let me down on all counts. Whoever was in charge of designing this needs to be fired! I cannot believe our President is being shamed by such a terrible “official” app!
attributes.title: Do NOT download this app!!!

attributes.review: I feel like this app is a waste of time and breath. WHO EVEN LIKES TRUMP?????? NASTY RACIST SEXIEST MAN. If you support this disgusting man my prayers go out to you. Their is something mentally wrong with you. I support trump 2020 but as the president of garbage cans. I’d rather have a dog run for president. Nobody likes expired Cheeto puffs anyway🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢
attributes.title: Slow and useless

attributes.review: This app has so many errors and always kicks people off of it and isnt really letting us do anything! It has very bad words in it and disrespectful!😩 no way am i going on it again!
attributes.title: Must read!🥺

attributes.review: This app is weird it keeps hacking into my email and accounts and my number keeps changing please delete this app it does not work how I expect it so now I can’t walk my hamster and grill my strawberry cookies😡
attributes.title: Please be notified 💖
